translation.en: ♪ Tue-- Tue-- Tuesday My never-be-blues day ♪
♪ Kick-off-your-shoes day for... ♪
Sing it with me, Share. [grunts]
♪ BFF-picnic Tuesday ♪
Ooh! And the crowd goes wild. [chuckles] Thank you. Thank you.
-I love our BFF Tuesday picnics, Harmony. -Me, too, sweetness.
translation.ko: 너와 소풍 가는 화요일이 참 좋아, 하모니 나도 그래, 쉐어

translation.en: Okay, have you got your famous Care-a-Lot cookies?
-Check. -Honey banana musical bars?
-Check. -Peanut butter, cranberry sauce,
marshmallow sandwiches sliced diagonally with the crusts off?
translation.ko: 땅콩버터 크랜베리 소스 마시멜로 세모 샌드위치도?

translation.en: Check, check, check. I would never forget my BFF's favorite.
translation.ko: 응! 네가 제일 좋아하는 걸 빼먹을 수 없지

translation.en: And I've got your second favorite and your third favorite,
translation.ko: 두 번째로 좋아하는 것과 세 번째로 좋아하는 것도

translation.en: all the way up to your seventeenth favorite.
Mm! Share, you always remember my favorite foods.
translation.ko: 너는 내가 좋아하는 걸 잊는 적이 없구나

translation.en: Now, that's a good friend.
I have lots of friends, Harmony.
But Tuesday is my favorite part of the week
because it's time I get to share with my BFF.
Best friends forever.
I feel the same way, Share.
These picnics are special for you and me.
translation.ko: 소풍 날은 너만 아니라 나에게도 특별하거든

translation.en: You're such a good friend that sometimes you know--
translation.ko: 넌 나랑 정말 친해서 어떤 때는...

translation.en: What you're about to say before you say it.
translation.ko: 말하기도 전에 무슨 말 할지 알고 있지

translation.en: -That's why we're BFFs and-- -Always will be.
translation.ko: - 그래서 우린 절친이야 - 늘 이렇게 지내자

translation.en: -To the Forest of Feelings, BFF. -Lead the way.
♪ Tuesday, Tuesday Never-be-blues day ♪
Wait a second, Share.
Something's going on.
Harmony! We need your help. It's a harmonic emergency.
translation.ko: 하모니! 너의 도움이 필요해 화음이 필요한 문제야

translation.en: Heh. More of a uke emergency.
See? 'Cause there's a ukulele stuck on his foot? [chuckles]
That's definitely a uke emergency.
Oh, you think that's bad?
Oh, sure, go ahead, laugh at my uke emergency.
translation.ko: 그래, 내 음악적 문제에 마음껏 웃어 봐

translation.en: Grumpy, Tenderheart and I were rehearsing our ukulele band
and having a jamming time.
But then Brave Heart, Bright Heart and Wonderheart came along
collecting Care Hearts, and, well...
Brave Heart went this way...
While Wonder went that way...
-Making Brighto go that way. -And then:
Ka-sproink!
-"Ka-sproink," huh? [both] Ka-sproink.
Definitely sounds like they need me, Share.
translation.ko: 내 도움이 꼭 필요할 것 같네, 쉐어

translation.en: Would it be terrible if we put off our picnic for today?
Oh, heh, that's okay.
After all, only you can repair a uke emergency. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 음악적인 문제는 너만 해결할 수 있잖아

translation.en: Sorry, Share. Harmonic emergencies wait for no bear.
translation.ko: 미안해, 쉐어 화음이 필요한 데는 무슨 일이 있어도 가야 해

translation.en: Even BFFs. But we'll do our picnic next week, okay?
translation.ko: 절친과 약속이 있어도 소풍은 다음 주에 가자

translation.en: Next week. Sure.
Huh? Oh, it's nothing, Cozy.
Just that... well, I was supposed to go on a picnic with Harmony today,
translation.ko: 그게... 오늘 하모니와 소풍 가는 날이었는데

translation.en: and she had to cancel.
It is a lovely picnic. I packed it specially for me and my BFF.
translation.ko: 도시락을 맛있게 쌌지 절친을 위해 특별히 쌌는데

translation.en: And now I don't know what to do with it.
translation.ko: 이젠 이걸 어떻게 해야 할지 모르겠어

translation.en: I mean, it's already packed and ready.
I shouldn't let it go to waste. Someone should eat it, right?
translation.ko: 그냥 버릴 순 없잖아 먹긴 해야 하니까

translation.en: Hey, why not us?
Yeah.
Unless you're busy today...
Then let's go to the Forest of Feelings. You're gonna love this place.
translation.ko: 그럼 마음의 숲으로 가자 가보면 정말 좋아할걸

translation.en: -Almost there. Are you ready? [Cozy chirps]
Here... it... is.
Ta-da!
Harmony and I discovered this secluded spot.
translation.ko: 이 한적한 곳을 하모니와 발견했지 뭐야

translation.en: It's the most amazing place in the whole Forest of Feelings,
translation.ko: 마음의 숲에서 제일 멋진 곳인 것 같아

translation.en: and nobody else has ever seen it.
Until now.
Time for the best picnic ever.
To get to the other side?
That's hilarious, Cozy.
[Harmony] Share? -Huh?
Restringing and tuning all those ukuleles was challenging.
translation.ko: 우쿨렐레의 줄을 바꾸고 조율하는 게 힘들었어

translation.en: But thanks to Harmony, our ukuleles are fixed,
translation.ko: 하지만 하모니 덕분에 이제 다 해결됐어

translation.en: and they sound totally radical.
Well, they will. Really. Heh.
I just haven't learned how to play the song yet.
translation.ko: 아직 곡 연주를 다 외우지 못했어

translation.en: Guess we'd better get back to our jam session. Later.
translation.ko: 그럼 이제 연주하러 가자 나중에 봐!

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you were able to fix your harmonic uke emergency.
Yes, and it didn't take as long as I expected.
translation.ko: 응, 그리고 생각보다 오래 걸리지 않았어

translation.en: I got back as fast as I could so we could go on our Tuesday no-blues-day
kick-off-your-shoes-day picnic after all.
translation.ko: 신발을 벗어 던지는 화요일 소풍에 가려고

translation.en: That's okay, Harmony. I already went on the picnic.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 하모니 소풍은 벌써 갔다 왔어

translation.en: Wait. You went on the picnic? Alone?
Nope. I brought Cozy along.
Oh. Oh, right. Of course you did.
After all, I did say I couldn't go, so... why wouldn't you go?
translation.ko: 내가 못 간다고 했으니 따로 갈 수도 있지

translation.en: Yes. And don't worry, I still had a great time without you.
translation.ko: 응, 걱정하지 마 네가 없었지만 좋은 시간을 보냈어

translation.en: Uh... Worry?
I know you probably were concerned that I would be disappointed.
translation.ko: 내가 섭섭할까 봐 걱정했을 것 같아서

translation.en: But Cozy and I had a blast. Right, Cozy?
So, you had fun, huh?
But was it as fun as when you and I spilled all that honey over our food?
translation.ko: 우리가 도시락에 꿀을 쏟았을 때만큼 재미있었어?

translation.en: [laughs] And we...
We ended up having a huge honey feast?
Oh, much more fun.
We had carrot-stick mustaches.
How fun is that?
Well, what about the time we sang "Row Your Boat" at the top of our lungs, huh?
translation.ko: 그럼 '배를 저어라'를 목청 터져라 불렀을 때는?

translation.en: That was fun, but listen to this:
Well, I guess you have a new BFF.
Ugh. What is this?
I cannot believe she just went with Cozy Heart Penguin.
I mean, some BFF she is.
That's our special place.
[groans] Breathe, girl.
Well, unless it's on a stage, Harmony is not about to be a solo artist.
translation.ko: 무대가 아닌 이상 난 독주하지 않을 거야

translation.en: Solo artist?
Oh. Sorry, Lotsa.
I was just thinking to myself that I might need a new BFF.
translation.ko: 새 절친을 만들어야겠다는 생각을 하고 있었거든

translation.en: Oh. Well, I'll be your BFF.
What's a BFF?
Best friend forever. [gasps]
And you would be a great one, Lottie.
translation.ko: 로티 너면 정말 좋은 절친이 될 것 같아

translation.en: Hey, how would you like to go on a picnic with me?
We'll have food and music and flowers and fun, fun, fun.
translation.ko: 도시락도 먹고 노래도 부르고 꽃구경도 하고 재미있게 노는 거야!

translation.en: We could do it tomorrow.
A picnic tomorrow? Sure.
-What's the occasion? -Occasion?
Well, because...
it's Wednesday.
Yes. And I just decided that is my new special day.
translation.ko: 그래, 특별한 요일을 수요일로 다시 정했어

translation.en: ♪ Wednesday, Wednesday That's my best-friends day ♪
Best friend. Oh, that's so nice.
translation.ko: 절친이 되는 건 참 좋은 것 같아

translation.en: -I've never had a BFF be-- -Before.
translation.ko: - 절친이 한 번도... - 해 본 적 없구나!

translation.en: See? We finish each other's sentences.
translation.ko: 봤지? 네가 무슨 말을 할지도 안다니까!

translation.en: It's just like we've been BFFs forever. [chuckles]
Tomorrow's gonna be the best picnic in Care Bear history.
translation.ko: 내일은 역사상 제일 멋진 소풍이 될 거야!

translation.en: You know, I'm always full of lots of love,
but, wow, Harmony,
you really know how to make a friend feel welcome.
translation.ko: 친구를 정말 반갑게 맞이하는 능력이 있구나

translation.en: I can't wait.
Oh, hey, did you guys just go on a picnic, too?
Yep, and then we sledded down in the picnic basket.
We did have the best time, huh, Cozy?
That sounds so fun.
And I can't wait to do some of those things, too.
Because guess what.
I'm going on a picnic tomorrow with my new BFF.
translation.ko: 새로 만든 절친과 내일 소풍 가기로 했어

translation.en: -Who's your new BFF? -Harmony.
Harmony is going on a picnic with someone other than me?
translation.ko: 하모니가 나 말고 다른 친구와 소풍을 가?

translation.en: Lousy bush.
[gasps] Cozy!
We had such a good time today...
I think we ought to have another picnic tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일도 소풍 가는 게 좋을 것 같아

translation.en: And I know it's going to be way better than Harmony's picnic.
translation.ko: 하모니가 가려는 소풍보다 훨씬 더 재미있을 거야

translation.en: What do you say, new BFF?
Now let's see...
We've got to make sure we have the best new treats.
translation.ko: 새로 만든 맛있는 간식도 꼭 준비해 가야 해

translation.en: I'll start baking tonight.
Share would always pack tasty treats for her picnic,
but she never had these special things in her basket.
translation.ko: 이렇게 특별한 악기는 준비한 적 없을걸

translation.en: Ukulele? Check.
Trumpet? Check.
Mini drum kit?
Oh, yeah. Checkity check and check and check.
Share's picnic basket may have been full of tastiness,
translation.ko: 쉐어의 소풍 바구니에는 맛있는 게 많겠지만

translation.en: but mine's full of harmoniousness.
Hey, hey, Harmony.
Look, I picked a beautiful bouquet of flowers, just like you asked.
translation.ko: 네가 부탁한 대로 예쁜 꽃다발을 준비해 왔어

translation.en: Oh! Thank you, Cheer.
They're the perfect addition to my picnic basket
translation.ko: 내 소풍 바구니에 아주 잘 어울리겠어

translation.en: for me and my new BFF, Lottie.
translation.ko: 나와 나의 새로운 절친 로티를 위한 꽃이야

translation.en: That is some picnic basket you got there, Harmony.
Flowers, musical instruments...
It's like a party in a basket.
Huh-huh. Party in a basket. Uh-huh.
Isn't it great?
I mean, have you ever seen a picnic basket as good as that?
translation.ko: 이렇게 멋진 소풍 바구니는 본 적 없지?

translation.en: You know, my old BFF, Share,
yeah, she never packed one like this.
translation.ko: 이런 소풍 바구니를 준비한 적이 없거든

translation.en: Huh? Old BFF?
Oh, nothing.
I'm just glad that you like it, Cheer.
In fact, how would you like to go with Lottie and me on a picnic tomorrow?
translation.ko: 그래서 그런데 내일 나랑 로티와 소풍 갈래?

translation.en: Oh. Really? Me?
I would love, love, L-U-V, love to.
Oh. But if you and Lottie are going alone, then I wouldn't wanna cramp your style.
translation.ko: 하지만 단둘이 가는 거라면 방해하고 싶진 않네

translation.en: Are you kidding?
The more BFFs, the better. Come on along.
translation.ko: 절친이 많으면 더 좋지 같이 가자

translation.en: Really? [chuckles] Okay, great. Go, picnic!
Snapricot scones? Check.
Bumbleberry Bundt cake? Check.
I thought I'd seen the most lovely picnic basket of them all,
translation.ko: 제일 멋진 소풍 바구니를 방금 봤다고 생각했는데

translation.en: but now I'm thinking I was wrong.
I made it especially for my new BFF.
translation.ko: 나의 새 절친을 위해 특별히 만들었어

translation.en: I have matching blanket and linens
and of course, the biggest assortment of goodies I've ever made.
Doesn't it look delicious?
Mm-mm! Yummy. It sure does.
Cheer, you should totally join us at our picnic tomorrow.
translation.ko: 치어, 내일 우리랑 같이 소풍 가자

translation.en: Oh, this basket is for tomorrow's picnic?
translation.ko: 아, 내일 소풍 때 먹을 도시락이구나

translation.en: I already know all about it. And of course. I'll be there.
Wait, you knew? How did you--? Oh, never mind.
Meet us in the Forest of Feelings.
We'll have so much fun. The more BFFs, the better.
translation.ko: 정말 재미있을 거야 절친이 많을수록 좋지

translation.en: Almost there. Are you ready?
translation.ko: 거의 다 왔어 놀랄 준비 됐지?

translation.en: Here... it... is.
[both] Ta-da!
Share? What are you doing here?
Having a new-BFF picnic. What are you doing?
translation.ko: 새로 만든 절친이랑 소풍 왔지 그러는 너는?

translation.en: I'm having a new-BFF picnic.
translation.ko: 나도 새로 만든 절친이랑 소풍 왔어

translation.en: -Come on, new BFF. -Come on, new BFF.
translation.ko: - 가자, 새 친구야 - 가자, 새 친구야

translation.en: Look, Lottie, this is the perfect place for our musical picnic.
translation.ko: 로티, 음악 소풍은 여기가 딱 맞을 것 같아

translation.en: Oh, Cozy, let's enjoy our delectable-delights picnic here,
where the light is just right.
Wow, Share, your picnic blanket sure is beautiful.
Lottie. Look at our picnic's perfect floral display.
translation.ko: 로티, 우리에게도 완벽한 소풍 꽃장식이 있어

translation.en: Yes, it's very... fascinating.
Isn't it wonderful how at our picnic, the blanket and the napkins all match, Cozy?
translation.ko: 돗자리와 냅킨이 짝이라서 정말 좋지 않아, 코지?

translation.en: Eating is so much more fun to the sweet sounds of music,
translation.ko: 감미로운 음악이 있으면 소풍이 훨씬 더 재미있어

translation.en: wouldn't you agree, Lottie?
Well, yeah...
Yeah?
[grunts] But the best thing about this picnic
is I get to share it with my BFF, Cozy.
translation.ko: 내 절친 코지와 도시락을 나눠 먹는 거지

translation.en: Well, the great thing about my picnic
is that I'm in perfect harmony with my BFF, Lottie.
translation.ko: 내 절친 로티와 잘 어울려서 좋아

translation.en: Say, Harmony, this is fun and all...
but, uh, look at all these instruments.
What if we all play some music together?
translation.ko: 우리 모두 함께 연주하는 건 어때?

translation.en: What do you think, Cozy?
What? No. Why would you wanna do that?
Aren't you having fun with just me?
No, let's not do that, Cozy.
We have so many other fun things going on, we won't have time to join their picnic.
translation.ko: 재미있는 게 너무 많아서 같이 놀 시간도 없을걸

translation.en: Aw. Come on, you two.
Can we just remember how much we all love, love, love each other?
translation.ko: 우리가 얼마나 서로를 사랑하는지 잊은 거야?

translation.en: Wait, Cozy.
That picnic doesn't have the sweet treats our picnic has.
Oh, Lottie, you gotta check out the rest of the great instruments I brought for our picnic.
translation.ko: 로티, 내가 준비한 다른 악기들도 볼래?

translation.en: [Cozy chirps] [Lottie] Uh-oh.
-Okay, what are all these weird bushes? -They're growing all over the place.
translation.ko: 이 이상한 덤불은 뭐지? 여기저기에 다 나타나잖아

translation.en: [both] Ouch! [Cheer] Yoo-hoo!
translation.ko: 아야! 얘들아, 안녕! 늦어서 정말 미안해

translation.en: Hello, guys? I'm so sorry I'm late. But I'm here for the pic...
translation.ko: 얘들아, 안녕! 늦어서 정말 미안해 소풍 때문에 왔...

translation.en: ...nic.
Cheer, we are so glad you're here.
Share and Harmony are--
Cheer, you made it. Come on over and join the fun on our side. Ah!
translation.ko: 치어, 왔구나! 이쪽으로 와서 우리랑 놀자

translation.en: If you're joining the fun, you should be coming over here.
translation.ko: 재미있게 놀고 싶다면 우리 쪽으로 와

translation.en: I invited Cheer.
Uh, I'm the one who invited her.
Actually, both of you invited me.
translation.ko: 사실 너희 둘 모두에게 초대를 받았어

translation.en: But I thought it was supposed to be one big picnic.
translation.ko: 나는 다 함께 즐기는 소풍인 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, Cheer.
I invited you because our picnic is too awesome for just two, okay?
translation.ko: 우리 둘만 즐기기엔 너무 아까워서 내가 초대한 거야

translation.en: We need three BFFs
to complete the awesomeness that's happening over here.
Uh, if you want an awesomest extraordinary three-BFF picnicking experience, Cheer,
translation.ko: 절친 셋이서 즐기는 최고의 소풍을 원한다면

translation.en: step right over here.
[Cheer] Okay. Oh, my. Wait a second.
Girls, listen. You've got to stop this.
Oh, no. Harmony? Share? Cozy? Lottie?
I can't even see you.
How am I ever going to get my friends out of there?
What are Jealouspikle Junipers doing here?
Ah. Let's see.
They seem to go right... over...
Ow! Hey, watch where you're...
uh, standing.
[chuckles] -Huh? Oh. Hi, Beastly.
Well, what are you looking at?
No big deal, Cozy.
Our friendship is so strong, nothing can ruin our time together.
translation.ko: 우린 진실된 친구라서 함께하는 시간을 망칠 일은 절대 없어

translation.en: Not even a bunch of weird, sharp, bitter-smelling bushes.
translation.ko: 이상하고 뾰족하고 쓴 덤불도 우릴 못 막아

translation.en: Harmony, are we gonna do something about this?
You bet, Lottie.
This is a story we're gonna tell each other for years to come and laugh.
translation.ko: 오늘 일은 오랫동안 기억하면서 웃게 될 거야

translation.en: [laughs] Remember that time those crazy spiky bushes
tried to attack our BFF picnic?
translation.ko: 소풍을 망치려 한 건 추억이 될 거야

translation.en: Not that I care,
but how did those four get stuck in the Jealouspikle Junipers?
translation.ko: 저 넷이 무슨 일로 질투 가시덤불에 싸였어?

translation.en: Jealouspikle Junipers? Is that what these things are?
Yeah. [chuckles]
I'm bitter and jealous all the time,
translation.ko: 난 늘 질투하고 나쁜 마음을 먹어서

translation.en: so, I've practically got a whole Jealouspikle garden. Mm.
Oh, yeah. You've got some major jealousy going on over here.
But why are they growing right here?
translation.ko: 그런데 왜 이게 여기에 자라는 거야?

translation.en: Well, Cheer Bear, like all plants,
translation.ko: 그건 말이지, 치어 질투 가시덤불도 식물이라 땅에서 자라지

translation.en: Jealouspikle Junipers grow out of the ground.
But instead of growing from water and sunlight,
translation.ko: 하지만 물과 햇볕을 받고 자라는 게 아니라

translation.en: these bushes grow from feelings of jealousy.
translation.ko: 이 덤불은 질투를 먹고 자라는 거지

translation.en: -Jealousy, huh? -Oh, yeah.
And once you're a little jealous, that jealousy feeds on more jealousy.
translation.ko: 한 번 질투하면 더 많이 질투하게 돼 있어

translation.en: All it takes is a little bit, and it grows and grows
and grows and grows and grows!
Whoa! Whoa. Wait.
Those Jealouspikle Junipers are dividing my friends from each other even more.
translation.ko: 이 질투 가시덤불이 내 친구들 사이를 갈수록 더 갈라놓고 있어

translation.en: [chuckles] It's probably too late to save them.
The only spot left with no Jealouspikle Junipers
is right in the middle.
And that's exactly what they need to do: meet in the middle.
translation.ko: 그래, 그렇게 하면 되겠다 가운데서 만나면 돼

translation.en: Hip, hip, hooray!
Hoorays o'clock. Go, Beastly. Go, Beastly.
Come on, you did it. You figured it out.
Give me some love, Beasters. Come on, bring it in. Bring it in.
translation.ko: 네가 참 좋다, 비스틀리 이리 와 봐

translation.en: Hey! Hands off the merchandise.
What do you think this is, a petting zoo? Gross!
translation.ko: 내가 애완동물인 줄 알아? 정말 싫어!

translation.en: Ooh, ooh! Harmony. Share. Please stop.
These bushes are Jealouspikle Junipers, and they are being created by you.
translation.ko: 이건 질투 가시덤불이고 너희가 만들고 있는 거야

translation.en: -Us? -Us?
Yes with a double S-S. You.
You're both jealous of each other and your new friendships.
translation.ko: 서로의 새 친구를 두고 질투하고 있잖아

translation.en: Please. That's ridiculous.
I am not jealous.
Even though you seem way happier without me as your BFF,
translation.ko: 물론 너는 나 없이도 정말 즐거워 보이지만

translation.en: but you know, whatevs.
Pashaw. Me either. I'm totally fine.
translation.ko: 나도 질투 안 하거든 난 정말 괜찮아

translation.en: Although you seem perfectly delighted now that I'm not your BFF.
translation.ko: 넌 내가 절친이 아니어서 정말 좋아 보인다

translation.en: Well, bears, something is causing these Junipers to grow.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 이 덤불이 자라는 이유가 있을 것 아니야

translation.en: Are you sure you're not feeling a little eensy-beensy-weensy bit jealous?
Well, I guess it did make me feel bad
when Share took Cozy to our special picnic place.
translation.ko: 쉐어가 코지를 데리고 우리의 특별 공간에 갔거든

translation.en: I kind of didn't want her to be happy, which made me feel even worse.
translation.ko: 그래서 쉐어가 즐거운 게 싫었어 그러니까 더 속상했지만

translation.en: And I was afraid that Harmony would become better friends with Lottie than with me.
translation.ko: 나는 하모니가 나보다 로티와 더 친해질까 봐 걱정됐어

translation.en: That made me feel afraid that I was losing my friend.
translation.ko: 친구를 잃는 것 같아서 불안했단 말이야

translation.en: Jealousy makes you feel that way.
And that's why these bushes grew and pushed you two bears apart.
translation.ko: 그래서 이 덤불이 자라서 너희 사이를 갈라놓았지

translation.en: But you can fix things by getting back together.
translation.ko: 하지만 해결할 수 있어 둘이 화해하면 돼

translation.en: Oh, come on, Share.
Are we gonna let a few Jealouspikle Junipers get in the way
translation.ko: 질투 가시덤불이 우리 사이를 갈라놓게 내버려 둘 거야?

translation.en: of our friendship?
translation.ko: 우리 사이를 갈라놓게 내버려 둘 거야?

translation.en: -That smarts. -Oh, no, Harmony.
I'm sorry I let jealousy come between us.
You know that I'll always be your BFF. [gasps]
Me, too, Share.
And I'm sorry I didn't tell you I was inviting Lottie today.
translation.ko: 오늘 로티를 초대한 것 얘기 안 해서 미안해

translation.en: It doesn't mean that I don't love our special time together, too.
translation.ko: 우리 둘만의 특별한 시간이 싫어서 그런 건 아니야

translation.en: This is great.
You guys, the Jealouspikle Junipers need jealousy to grow,
but when you feel less jealous, they go away.
Keep going. Go, go, go.
Well, I'm actually glad now that we found new friends.
translation.ko: 새 친구를 만나게 돼서 더 잘된 것 같아

translation.en: And knowing we will always have our special memories, too,
translation.ko: 우리 둘만의 특별한 추억도 있다는 걸 생각하니까

translation.en: makes me feel less jealous.
Yeah. Having Lottie and Cozy here with us just makes it more fun.
translation.ko: 맞아, 로티와 코지가 함께해서 오히려 더 즐거워

translation.en: We can all eat and play music.
-Aw, I missed you, Harmony. -I missed you, too, Share.
Look, you did it. You're out.
Cozy and I didn't know you were jealous because of us.
translation.ko: 우리 때문에 질투하는지 코지도 나도 몰랐어

translation.en: We don't wanna come between you.
Oh, no, Lottie, Cozy, you guys are the greatest.
translation.ko: 아니야, 너희 둘은 정말 좋은 친구야

translation.en: Having new friends shouldn't take anything away from our old friends.
translation.ko: 새 친구를 만난다고 해서 원래 친구가 없어지는 건 아니지

translation.en: We know now that it doesn't mean our old friends are any less special.
translation.ko: 원래 친구들이 덜 특별한 건 아니니까

translation.en: We love you.
Now that we're all back together,
let's make one big blanket for our group picnic.
Oh, and set out all the food together. And the flowers.
Each of us can play an instrument in the band.
We did it. Let's have some fun.
translation.ko: 다 같이 해냈다 이제 재미있게 놀자

translation.en: Hey, Share, you know what today is?
-♪ Tue-- Tue-- Tuesday ♪ -♪ My never-be-blues day ♪
♪ Kick-off-your-shoes day For BFF-picnic Tuesday ♪
translation.ko: 신발을 벗어 던지는 날 절친과 소풍 가는 화요일

translation.en: I've already told Cozy and Lottie to meet us there.
So, what do you say? Should we go?
[both] Sproing-boing, cling-clang.
Yeah, yeah, let me guess.
-Ka-sproink? -[grunts] How'd you know?
Listen, Grumpy and Funshine,
I wanna help you again, but Tuesday is BFF-picnic day,
translation.ko: 그럼피, 펀샤인 이번에도 도와주고 싶지만 화요일은 절친과 소풍 가는 날이라서

translation.en: and I will not miss it again this week.
translation.ko: 이번 주에 또 빠질 순 없어

translation.en: -Oh. -Okay.
But you two could join us on the picnic.
translation.ko: 하지만 너희도 우리랑 소풍 가도 돼

translation.en: And I bet we could fix those ukuleles up really nicely on the way.
translation.ko: 우쿨렐레는 가는 길에 얼마든지 고칠 수 있을걸

translation.en: -Fixed ukes? -And a picnic?
